text: The Tanzania Olympic Committee (IOC code: TAN) is the National Olympic Committee representing Tanzania. It was created and recognised by the IOC in 1968 Tanzania made its debut at the 1964 Summer Olympics in Tokyo where it was represented by four athletes. ==Presidents of Committee== * 2002 - Gulam Abdulla Rashid ==See also== * Tanzania at the Olympics ==References== Tanzania Tanzania Category:Sports governing bodies in Tanzania Category:Sports organizations established in 1968 Category:1968 establishments in Tanzania
title: Tanzania Olympic Committee
